name: Unfortunate Souls
description:
Unfortunate Souls This game is about fortune telling in a world where the future is bleak. What lies should a fortune teller tell to give hope to their patrons? Will you try to steer customers towards better options, or prioritize profit? The controls are entirely mouse-based, left and right click. You might have to resize the window if the UI isn't working correctly. The tutorial is built into the game and readily accessible when necessary.**Note since I forgot to put it in the tutorial, that your capital will only increase if you decrease the uncertainty of a patron, otherwise your capital will decrease. Additionally, if the game appears to be not accepting input look at the output panel in the bottom right and left-click anywhere on the screen to advance the text** The download version is slightly more stable than the web version if it's giving you issues.Thank you to LehouxGD for help with some art assets!

Please note that any beliefs held by a character in the game are not necessarily my own and are placed there for the purpose of challenging the player. Any likeness to real people or situations is purely coincidental.
